Uses of Interface
org.apache.lucene.index.QueryTimeout

  • Packages that use QueryTimeout 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.index
    Code to maintain and access indices.

    • Uses of QueryTimeout in org.apache.lucene.index

      Classes in org.apache.lucene.index that implement QueryTimeout 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  QueryTimeoutImpl
      An implementation of QueryTimeout that can be used by the ExitableDirectoryReader class to time out and exit out when a query takes a long time to rewrite.
      Methods in org.apache.lucene.index with parameters of type QueryTimeout 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DirectoryReader ExitableDirectoryReader.wrap(DirectoryReader in, QueryTimeout queryTimeout)
      Wraps a provided DirectoryReader.
